project_phrase: The machine does not replace humans. It amplifies their potential.
about_text: CareerDev AI helps developers evolve professionally with security, ethics, and responsible artificial intelligence.
quote_turing: We can only see a short distance ahead, but we can see plenty there that needs to be done. ‚Äî Alan Turing
quote_lanier: Technology is not destiny. We shape our tools, and thereafter our tools shape us. ‚Äî Jaron Lanier
footer_text: CareerDev AI ¬∑ Privacy by design ¬∑ No data is sold
chatbot_welcome: Hello! I'm here to help you sign in securely and understand the application.
chatbot_input_aria: Input field to type messages to the assistant
dash_trend_rust_desc: Memory safety and high performance. Ideal for critical systems.
trial_banner: First month free! Enjoy your trial period.
trial_register_notice: Sign up and get 1 month free! Unlock AI analysis and accelerate your career today.
billing_desc: To continue evolving your career, activate your subscription.
social_unified_note: For your security, we will request validation via LinkedIn followed by a connection with your GitHub.
integration_desc: We integrate with market-defining platforms to accelerate your evolution.
int_github_text: Connect GitHub to let our AI analyze your repositories, identify technical gaps, and generate study plans with practical micro-projects in high-demand technologies.
int_linkedin_text: Connect LinkedIn to monitor job trends and receive strategic networking suggestions, focusing on valuable niches like Ethical AI and Edge Computing.
int_impact_text: Transform your experience into authority. CareerDev AI fills the gap between what you know and what the market needs.
a11y_subtitle: Adaptive technology for all profiles. Enable in the control panel.
a11y_card_cognitive_text: Dyslexia-friendly fonts and visual noise reduction modes.
a11y_card_vision_text: High contrast and intelligent color blindness filters.
a11y_card_hearing_text: Graphic alerts and simplified AI communication.
a11y_card_motor_text: Enlarged click areas and voice navigation (Beta).
a11y_spotlight_title: Did you know? CareerDev AI adapts to you.
a11y_spotlight_text: Dyslexia, Color Blindness, Focus, and more. Customize your experience in the Universal Panel.
security_promise_subtitle: Your trust is the foundation of our architecture. Non-negotiable guarantees:
sec_card_selling_text: You are not the product. We never sell your information to third parties.
sec_card_encrypt_text: Data protected at rest and in transit. Bank-level security for your career.
sec_card_ai_text: Your data does not train public AI. Your interactions are isolated and confidential.
